lead_paragraph: COGUT--Justin, at the age of 97, passed away peacefully on June 30, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Marilyn "Lynn" Cogut (nee Gurien). Devoted father of Craig Cogut (Deborah) and Stephen Cogut. Loving grandfather of David, Jonathan, Daniel, Alexander, Gregory and Andrew. Private services will be held. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations be made to the Polyphony Foundation. 1/3
